title: Hybrid Models and Their Advantages
description: Explain the rationale behind combining different deep learning architectures..Discuss the benefits of hybrid models in capturing diverse aspects of EEG signals (e.g., spatial, temporal, spectral).

example.description: Combines Inception and ResNet for improved feature extraction from EEG signals.
Combines statistical feature extraction with deep learning for enhanced drowsiness detection accuracy.
Integrates temporal-channel attention and channel-connectivity attention for improved EEG analysis in fatigue detection.
Combines CNN and LSTM for subject-independent drowsiness recognition, offering interpretability.
Integrates LSTM with a capsule attention mechanism for enhanced driver vigilance estimation.
Integrates LSTM with a capsule attention mechanism for enhanced driver vigilance estimation.
Uses a multimodal tensor fusion network with LSTM and a self-attention mechanism for fatigue recognition.
Combines pre-trained networks with a custom 1D-CNN for effective single-channel EEG analysis.
Proposes hybrid models, ARMFCN-LSTM and GARMFCN-LSTM, combining deep learning techniques for fatigue detection.
Presents a hybrid model combining a separable CNN with Gumbel-Softmax for channel selection in real-time EEG-based driver drowsiness detection.

all_upper_levels.title: The Role of Deep Learning and Hybrid Models
all_upper_levels.section_id: 3. The Role of Deep Learning and Hybrid Models
